name: Ken
description: A slightly less beefy Ryu with high combo potentiaI. Due to the changes to the special cancel system, Ken can convert into a Shoryuken from any stray Jab, Nair, Uair, you name it. Ken's Shoryu is supposedly weaker than Ryu's, but still kills pretty well. Not to say he doesn't have combos, though.

combos.notes:
A fully charged focus attack into a short hop Dair.

True Shoryuken does a little more damage.

This combo is especially useful, considering the amount of damage the enemy needs to take before the combo is not guaranteed, and amount of damage the attack deals.
The Owen Wilson, good opening move if you can get the grab. Make sure to buffer the True Shoryuken out of the up air. The Shoryuken is a true input, but an Up-B works as well.
